aws_rds_cluster_instance.description: Provides an RDS Cluster Resource Instance

identifier.description: The identifier for the RDS instance, if omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique identifier.

identifier_prefix.description: Creates a unique identifier beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `identifier`.

engine.description: The name of the database engine to be used for the RDS instance. Defaults to `aurora`. Valid Values: `aurora`, `aurora-mysql`, `aurora-postgresql`.

instance_class.description: The instance class to use. For details on CPU

publicly_accessible.description: Bool to control if instance is publicly accessible.

db_subnet_group_name.description: A DB subnet group to associate with this DB instance. **NOTE:** This must match the `db_subnet_group_name` of the attached [`aws_rds_cluster`](/docs/providers/aws/r/rds_cluster.html).

db_parameter_group_name.description: The name of the DB parameter group to associate with this instance.

monitoring_role_arn.description: The ARN for the IAM role that permits RDS to send

monitoring_interval.description: The interval, in seconds, between points when Enhanced Monitoring metrics are collected for the DB instance. To disable collecting Enhanced Monitoring metrics, specify 0. The default is 0. Valid Values: 0, 1, 5, 10, 15, 30, 60.

promotion_tier.description: Default 0. Failover Priority setting on instance level. The reader who has lower tier has higher priority to get promoted to writer.

availability_zone.description: The EC2 Availability Zone that the DB instance is created in. See [docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/APIReference/API_CreateDBInstance.html

preferred_backup_window.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created if automated backups are enabled.

preferred_maintenance_window.description: The window to perform maintenance in.

auto_minor_version_upgrade.description: Indicates that minor engine upgrades will be applied automatically to the DB instance during the maintenance window. Default `true`.

performance_insights_enabled.description: Specifies whether Performance Insights is enabled or not.

performance_insights_kms_key_id.description: The ARN for the KMS key to encrypt Performance Insights data. When specifying `performance_insights_kms_key_id`, `performance_insights_enabled` needs to be set to true.

copy_tags_to_snapshot.description: Indicates whether to copy all of the user-defined tags from the DB instance to snapshots of the DB instance. Default `false`.

ca_cert_identifier.description: The identifier of the CA certificate for the DB instance.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the instance.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of cluster instance
